title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 September 2013 - XWiki
content:

08:36 <vmassol> good morning, BFD today...  
08:43 <polx> has quit  
08:44 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <vmassol> has quit  
08:56 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:57 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <kstuart> has quit  
09:50 <kstuart> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <msmeria> good morning  
09:52 <msmeria> sdumitriu, vmassol: I have a question regarding the "Share page by email" feature  
09:53 <msmeria> I'm trying to share a page and include the document "inline in the message"  
09:53 <msmeria> the page includes one image (png file attached to the page)  
09:54 <msmeria> should the image from the e-mail be inline or should it point to the image from the wiki server ?  
09:54 <msmeria> I currently get a link to the image from the server  
09:55 <msmeria> so if the server is stopped the image doesn't appear inside the e-mail  
09:58 <vmassol> msmeria: I don't know what's the wanted behavior. Obviously it would be better that the image be in the email I believe  
09:59 <vmassol> so if this doesn't happen I think you could open a jira issue as an improvement  
10:02 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <msmeria> vmassol: that's what I wanted to know: the wanted behaviour. maybe sdumitriu knows more about this feature  
10:03 <msmeria> I'll wait for his answer and then create the issue if needed  
10:26 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:30 <vmassol> grrrr  
10:30 <vmassol> I put all the pages in the wrong wiki ;)  
10:31 <vmassol> moving pages from one wiki to another is a real pita  
10:38 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
11:05 <gdelhumeau> hi dev  
11:06 <gdelhumeau> I am working on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8455  
11:06 <gdelhumeau> I have added the support of lower(), upper(), etc... in the ORDER BY clause and it works  
11:06 <gdelhumeau> I have also added it for GROUP BY, and it works on MySQL, but not in HSQLDB  
11:07 <gdelhumeau> What should I do?  
11:07 <gdelhumeau> enable it anyway? or don't add lower() support in GROUP BY?  
11:10 <gdelhumeau> "Caused by: org.hsqldb.HsqlException: expression not in aggregate or GROUP BY columns: XWIKIDOCUM0\_.XWD\_FULLNAME"  
11:12 <gdelhumeau> It is more complicated: With HSQLDB 2.2.x or later:  
11:12 <gdelhumeau> When you use GROUP BY, all your selected columns must be in the GROUP BY list, except any column that is an aggregate. In your example, the GROUP BY list should contain 11 columns, not one column.  
11:47 <vmassol> ok guys  
11:47 <vmassol> I"ve finished writing a new doc page for listing EP  
11:47 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ExtensionPoint/WebHome  
11:47 <vmassol> hope you like it :)  
11:57 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: looks nice  
12:05 <vmassol> hmm I have some problems with adium… using all my CPU… going to stop it  
12:06 <vmassol> has quit  
12:39 <gdelhumeau> gdelhumeau Lunch time  
12:43 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:49 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
13:01 <Enygma`> has quit  
13:04 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <vmassol> sorry I had forgotten I had stopped my adium client...  
14:44 <vmassol> guys, I'm working on adding translation for the solr search admin  
14:45 <vmassol> the existing translation page is "on demand"  
14:45 <vmassol> the issue is that my page has a title that I need translated and the call to use() hasn't been done yet...  
14:45 <vmassol> should I call it from the title? or is there a better way?  
14:46 <vmassol> ($services.localization.use())  
14:47 <vmassol> note that this would mean calling it twice: once for the title and once for the content  
14:47 <vmassol> is it better to use "wiki" level?  
14:47 <vmassol> (a pity we don't have "space" level...)  
14:47 <vmassol> tmortagne: any idea?  
14:49 <vmassol> ok I'm going to use "wiki" for now  
14:49 <tmortagne> I guess the simpler for now is to use WIKI level  
14:49 <vmassol> ok  
14:51 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
14:57 <vmassol> forcing a reload of some language file on l10n  
14:58 <msmeria> vmassol: there's already an issue on Jira about the "Share by email" feature: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9064  
14:58 <vmassol> ok
